title: 'Hustlers' Earns $33M in Box Office Debut, 'Goldfinch' Bombs With $2.6M | THR News
text: John: This Judge was appointed by Bush Jr: On July 31, 2008, Judge Bates ruled in a dispute between the Administrative and Legislative branches, that President George W. Bush's advisers, chief of staff Josh Bolten and former legal counsel Harriet Miers, are not immune from congressional subpoenas to testify about the firing of nine U.S. attorneys and turn over all related, non-privileged documents.[16][17] Yet the law and order party, that would be the PAB party, continues to not follow the rule of law. May the Lord help them.
description: 'It: Chapter Two' stayed atop the chart in its second weekend with a strong $41 million, while 'The Goldfinch' marked one of the worst starts ever for a movie opening in more than 2,500 cinemas.
